snippet: Editors and writers at The Journal News, in suburban New York, have received threats in retaliation for an online map showing the names and addresses of permit holders.
abstract: Editors and writers at The Journal News, daily newspaper from White Plains, NY, have received threatening calls and e-mails in retaliation for publishing an online map giving  names and addresses of local handgun permit holders; paper, which argues that people have right to know who owns guns in their community, has hired armed guards to monitor its headquarters and ensure staff safety.
lead_paragraph: Editors and writers at The Journal News, in suburban New York, have received threats in retaliation for an online map showing the names and addresses of permit holders.

headline.seo: After Pinpointing Gun Owners, Journal News Is a Target
headline.main: After Pinpointing Gun Owners, Paper Is a Target
headline.print_headline: After Pinpointing Gun Owners, Paper Is a Target
